title: PLEASE, can someone help me finding these fonts? :(
content:
I've been looking for these fonts but I just can't find them :/  
Can someone help me sending me the download links for these fonts please? :)  
These are the images, two fonts.  
 [http://www.brandsoftheworld.com/brands/0017/5008/brand.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20100116021144/http:/www.brandsoftheworld.com/brands/0017/5008/brand.gif "http://www.brandsoftheworld.com/brands/0017/5008/brand.gif")  
and  
 [http://i699.photobucket.com/albums/vv356/greatvalueplus/parishilton-logo...](http://web.archive.org/web/20100116021144/http:/i699.photobucket.com/albums/vv356/greatvalueplus/parishilton-logo.jpg "http://i699.photobucket.com/albums/vv356/greatvalueplus/parishilton-logo.jpg")

Thank you so much.  
You can email me the links to my email: [alan.rawr@live.com](mailto:alan.rawr@live.com)  
Thank you so much, hope you could help me please. I need them so bad. :)  
Thanks for all. Bye :D
author: Alansiin

comments.content: You came to the wrong website.
I know the the second one, it is a non-free font, are you ready to pay for the download?

\> I need them so bad.

I'm sure you'll survive. Just not around here.

hhp

@ apankrat, Miro and hrant

Why does nobody of you shortly explain, why this is the wrong place to request font files, although at least one of you is a typeface designer?

@ Alansiin

This is the wrong place, because many of the people here are typeface designers. That’s their profession, but not their hobby. They want to be payed for their work; and the development of high-class fonts is very much work. The problem is not mainly a poor student, that uses an unlicensed font for his private purposes, but people, that earn money with projects, for which they have used unlicensed fonts. Unfortunately many of these type designers compare the passing on of font files with the theft of material things, which is not really a plausible explanation for people like you, because a Porsche cannot be copied in milliseconds.

Arno, thank you.

You've been here less than half a year - you have more energy! :-)  
These 9+ years have used up my patience I guess.

hhp

@ Arno  
I wanted to torture him first, I am such a evil b\*\*\*\*\*\* ;-D  
No, seriously, he didn´t exactly say that if he wanted free or normal download links so I wasn´t sure.

Paris Hilton would have been a reason to torture.

Off topic:

"To need something so bad", is that common street English? I like those ambiguities. I need you so bad, girl! I remember a scene from Clockwork Orange. Alex says there (retranslated from German to English, I would like to know the original wording): All I want to be, is _good_. Shouldn’t it be called "All I want to be, is being good"?
